Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm totally new to these forums (hence my posting here), but not really to KSP. That doesn't mean I'm a safe mission commander though. Far from it. In fact, it links into my first question:

Is there some way to work out mathematically when and where to make a orbital transfer to another planet? I can't seem to guess correctly, and am not smart enough to work it out myself. Also, if you happen to be thinking of anwering that question, bear in mind I'm and idiot.

Why am I finding all the Kerbal Space Program sites quite slow to load?

Why can't I edit my profile at all? It just says I'm not allowed.

Thanks very much!

Hi MrAmazingFuntime, welcome to the community

One of our Moderation team has come up with just the tool you need, an orbit calculator!

Why am I finding all the Kerbal Space Program sites quite slow to load?

Release 0.17 just came out, and with it came all the zillions of downloads of the program. Basically the servers got hammered by all of the users. Now that it's tapered off somewhat the site's getting back to normal.
I thought as much. Thanks very much.
